    Books

    Any questions, please call us

    Books are the corner store of Choices. We have evolved our selection over 25 years, and now boast the most concentrated selection of wellness and recovery books per square foot! If you need any book related to recovery, mental, emotional and spiritual wellness, Choices is your best bet! We carry all of the conference approved literature from AA, NA, CoDa, Alanon, DA, CA, just to name a few. Plus, tons of variety in addiction, recovery, finances, relationships, love, health, religion, spirituality, meditation and personal growth. Our entire collection is built from love, and geared toward helping you on your journey. At Choices, you will always have a resource, and safe, friendly environment to explore.
